text: Ashley: Guys, you have to read this book!  <file_photo> </s><s> Marcus: Why, what's so special about it? </s><s> Erin: I think I've already heard about it from someone. Is it really that good? </s><s> Ashley: It's the best thing I've ever read! Completely life-changing! It's opened my eyes to a lot of things. </s><s> Seamus: Sorry, but I don't like books that are written to change my life. I prefer books that are simply fun to read :P </s><s> Marcus: I get what you mean. I feel like some authors are so concentrated on making their books full of wisdom that they completely forget that they should also be readable. </s><s> Erin: Do you mean Coelho? XD </s><s> Marcus: No, while I'm not a fan of his, at least I've never fallen asleep while reading his books. I meant this one for example: <file_other> </s><s> Ashley: Erm, I quite like his books. </s><s> Seamus: Did they change your life too? :D </s><s> Ashley: Wait, I meant Coelho. I've never read the other guy. </s><s> Marcus: Trust me, don't. There are lots of better ways of wasting your time. </s><s> Ashley: LOL, okay, I trust you. But the one I posted at the beginning is really good. It's not just some philosophical gibberish, it's actually a crime novel, so there's a lot of action too. </s><s> Erin: Does it have a cute detective? ;) </s><s> Ashley: Even two of them, actually. Believe me, you won't be able to decide which one to love more! </s><s> Erin: Okay, I'm already sold :D
summary: Erin is convinced by Ashley's book recommendations, while Seamus and Marcus aren't.

text: Aria: You won't believe who I've just met! </s><s> Aria: Charlie Evans! </s><s> Maverick: Oh God, I haven't seen him from ages! </s><s> Maverick: How is he doing? </s><s> Aria: He's doing great. :) </s><s> Aria: He got married, he runs a small family business, which he is very passionate about and generally he seems to be a happy and fulfilled man. :) </s><s> Aria: Oh, and he has two absolutely adorable daughters. :) </s><s> Aria: It was so nice to meet him, he's such a sweet soul. </s><s> Maverick: I’m glad to hear that. :) </s><s> Maverick: Time flies so fast, doesn't it? </s><s> Aria: It does. :) Recently I’ve met Cooper Roy, I'm sure you remember him, I constantly talked about him back then in high school, because I had a huge crush on him. He’s changed a lot! </s><s> Aria: I barely recognized him! </s><s> Maverick: I remember, how you and Kylie used to gossip about him all the time. :) </s><s> Aria: Well, we were madly in love with him. </s><s> Aria: Or at least we thought so. ;) </s><s> Maverick: I sometimes miss those times. </s><s> Maverick: Everything seemed to be easier, better and calmer back then. </s><s> Aria: The world wasn’t as crazy as it is now. </s><s> Aria: I feel like politics got crazier, people - more radical and hostile and economics - less predictable... </s><s> Maverick: Me too...:(
summary: Aria has just run into Charlie Evans. He is now married, with two daughters, and a family business. She has also met Cooper Roy from high school. She used to have a crush on him, now she almost didn't recognise him. Maverick and Aria miss the old times and think the world has changed for the worse.

text: Renee: Just saying Hi. Thought of you this morning.Layla misses you. She is having knee surgery. Hope you are doing well. </s><s> Rachel: Renee! Hey! Whoa! So crazy that you wrote. I was literally thinking of you the other day as well.  </s><s> Rachel: I am doing really well, getting settled here and everything. Looking for a new job.  </s><s> Rachel: Layla is getting knew surgery?! What happened? </s><s> Renee: Her arthritis got really bad. I saw her limping every time we went out for a walk, and so I took her to the vet and they decided she needs surgery.  </s><s> Rachel: Oh wow. That is really intense. I am sending her lots of love. </s><s> Renee: Thanks Rachel.  </s><s> Renee: Here is a pic of Layla from this morning. </s><s> Renee: <file_picture> </s><s> Renee: She is all cute in her usual spot.  </s><s> Rachel: Ha! Yeah, I remember, she would always try to fit in there even though she's obviously too big </s><s> Rachel: 😂 </s><s> Renee: Yeah, she's always getting into some sort of silly situations. </s><s> Renee: What kind of work are you looking for? </s><s> Rachel: Just the usual, something with teaching. I am not too stressed yet, I have some savings. </s><s> Renee: That's good, yeah, you don't want to have to feel pressured into taking a certain job.  </s><s> Renee: Just so you know, if you are ever back, you are more than welcome to come back and work for me.  </s><s> Renee: Layla is definitely missing you taking her on walks everyday.  </s><s> Rachel: Aw, yeah, I miss you guys too. Of course :) If I am ever back I will let you know!
summary: Layla the dog misses Rachel. She is having a knee surgery, because of arthritis. Renee sends a picture of her dog. Rachel getting settled and she's looking for a job in teaching.

text: Ray: Hey guys, I don't know if you heard but someone stole my bike yesterday so I'm going to post it on fb and would appreciate if you share! THX </s><s> Sam: shit, man, sorry to hear, I will share for sure </s><s> Luke: when was it, Ray? I had mine stolen last month around when I parked around on the 9th street </s><s> Ray: Mine was there too :( cops said it's a common area for it to happen but I still havent lost hope :( </s><s> Scott: Did they check the security cameras around the place? Maybe Mariott people saw someone? </s><s> Ray: Apparently they don't overlook that area...  </s><s> Luke: Yeah, cops were completely useless too, I ended up going to Mariott on my own and asking people but they didn't see anything. I emailed their manager if they could look at the tapes but because of privacy issues blah blah blah it was a no go... Good luck man! </s><s> Ray: I mean those guys are pros... I had high grade lock on mine and an app alert and it didn't do shit. Now I'm out few grand and pissed off </s><s> Scott: I would be too. Did you post posters in the area? it's a busy street so maybe someone saw something </s><s> Ray: Yeah, I'm getting around to it now and I really hope that smeone was sober enough to notice anything. I mean it's a custom bike so I hope if they try to get rid of it it will rise suspicion </s><s> Luke: I think it might ve already been turned into parts and shipped off. Even if you wanted to keep it and painted it, you could still recognize it </s><s> Ray: I know, that's why I wanna reach as many people as posible,maybe they ll get spooked and leave it somewhere </s><s> Sam: Let us know if you need someone to go dumpster diving with  </s><s> Ray: Heh, thx Sam! I appreciate all help
summary: Ray's bike was stolen from the 9th street yesterday even though it was secured. It was a custom bike so now Ray's out few grand. Ray wants to post posters in the area so they'll get scared and leave it somewhere. Luke had one stolen last month from the same area. Sam wants to help out.

text: Andrea: hey Babes, how's it going? I've got some job to do. 20 short texts for an online shop. 50% for correction. Deadline in two weeks. Will you help me? </s><s> Sondra: Hi, sorry I don't think Im gonna make it. It is hard these days. </s><s> Andrea: ? </s><s> Sondra: My cat is dying and nanny's leaving... :/ </s><s> Andrea: damn.. sorry to hear that. I f you could give me someone, maybe you know somebody suitable? I know aleady Jill can't do it :/ </s><s> Sondra: Jill is the best. Other people need assitance. Do you want these contacts? </s><s> Andrea: not really... </s><s> Sondra: :) </s><s> Andrea: If you found a window in a spacetime, please let me know. Ill get the texts on Friday. </s><s> Sondra: OK, but I dont think it will happen. The first window I see is probably in June. </s><s> Andrea: I understand. I hope the kitty is going to make it, I keep my fingers crossed for him.. </s><s> Sondra: In march Im gonna have as many as ONE free evening if everything goes well. Thanks he is still alive, maybe he is stronger than it looks now. </s><s> Andrea: <file_gif>
summary: Andrea must correct 50% of 20 short texts for an online shop. She has a deadline in two weeks. Sondra cannot help Andrea, because her cat is dying and nanny's leaving. Jill also cannot help. Sondra will probably have only one free evening in March and more free time probably in June.

text: William: Hey. Today i saw you were arguing with Blackett. </s><s> William: Are you guys fine? </s><s> Elizabeth: Hi. Sorry you had to see us argue. </s><s> Elizabeth: It was just a small misunderstanding but we will solve it. </s><s> William: Hope so </s><s> William: You think I should to talk to him about it? </s><s> Elizabeth: No don't </s><s> Elizabeth: He won't like it that we talked after the argument. </s><s> William: Ok. But if you need any help, don't hesitate to call me </s><s> Elizabeth: Definitely

text: Henry: Hey Lily, tried to catch you on landline but no answer. Gone already? Let me know when we can talk. </s><s> Lily: Am driving to town. </s><s> Henry: OK </s><s> Henry: Before we talk: I bumped into William in the street yesterday and we ended up in a pub. Poor chappy! Really. He'll never recover from his loss. En passant I mentioned our trip to Riehen next week and had an impression he'd be happy to be taken along. What d'you think? </s><s> Henry: I thought it doesn't matter that much to us and he's a nice chap, interesting to talk to, good company. And he seems sort of famished for company, old friends around him. You know what I mean. </s><s> Henry: And that could be our good deed before Xmas! ;) </s><s> Lily: Traffic was soooooo slow but I couldn't really reply. In the lecture now. </s><s> Lily: I always liked William, have no problem with him joining us to Riehen. How do you imagine that? </s><s> Henry: He'll come to FR, leave his car in my drive and in mine we'll pick you up. </s><s> Lily: Very good. A coffee at mine before we start? </s><s> Henry: I thought maybe a meal together afterwards? </s><s> Lily: Even better. I like that! Haven't seen him for ages, so glad to meet him again. </s><s> Lily: Will you arrange it all? </s><s> Henry: Sure. But get prepared: he has aged. Quite visible now. </s><s> Lily: But not mentally I hope? </s><s> Henry: No, intellectually not at all. But there's this sadness around him. An air of depression. </s><s> Lily: We'll cheer him up. If only for a day. Have to finish now.  Cheers!
summary: Henry and Lily take William with them to Riehen. They will meet with him for a coffee before they start, and eat a meal together afterwards.

text: Linda: I'm going to have my room painted </s><s> Linda: Can't decide what colors would best express my personality </s><s> Linda: I'm considering advices, do you have one for me maybe? :) </s><s> Brian: Fitting your personality... hmm </s><s> Brian: I consider you an enthusiastic and lively person and the color for it is yellow </s><s> Brian: On the other hand you can be calm and steady and they say those qualities are expressed in greyness </s><s> Brian: So yellow & grey, how do you like the idea? :D </s><s> Linda: Wow, I'm impressed! </s><s> Linda: You've just paid me a compliment and come up with interesting colors! </s><s> Brian: Well, those are actually facts :) </s><s> Brian: Are you going to make use of the colors? </s><s> Linda: Actually, I was planning to ask a few friends and then sum all the ideas up </s><s> Linda: But now I think I don't need to do any further research </s><s> Linda: Asking you for help was a bull's-eye! :D </s><s> Brian: Perfection! :D </s><s> Brian: I'll come and check the results of your work soon, it'll be a nice chance for us to talk :) </s><s> Linda: Sure, feel invited!
summary: According to Brian, colors that match Linda's personality are yellow and grey.

text: Oli: I've talked to some people from the third year </s><s> Jacob: About the statistics exam? </s><s> Marcia: What did they say? </s><s> Oli: Yeah, about the exam </s><s> Oli: We need to prepare for a battle </s><s> Jacob: So it will be difficult </s><s> Oli: They said it was the hardest exam ever </s><s> Marcia: 😱 </s><s> Oli: The questions were displayed on the screen  </s><s> Oli: One minute per question and it disappears </s><s> Oli: They won't come back so if you didn't get your answer you're fucked </s><s> Marcia: So we need to make the calculations really fast </s><s> Jacob: That's insane </s><s> Oli: I know </s><s> Oli: Very stressful </s><s> Marcia: How are we even supposed to study for it? </s><s> Marcia: With a timer? </s><s> Oli: I guess </s><s> Marcia: Did anybody pass it last year </s><s> Oli: Some people did, but the majority had to take the second or even the third chance

text: Blake: Why did you tell Steven all those stupid things? </s><s> Alexis: What things? </s><s> Blake: That I did not want him. It's just not true and you know it. </s><s> Alexis: I remember things differently, sorry. </s><s> Blake: You're his mother, I cannot cut you from him, but I really believe you have a terrible influence on him. </s><s> Alexis: I would rather say it about you. </s><s> Blake: Please, stop. I've taken so much care of him in the last years and I always avoid talking with him about you. </s><s> Alexis: Why should you avoid the topic? Is it better to pretend I do not exist? </s><s> Blake: Nobody pretends that, but I don't want to drag him into our games. Your games, actually. </s><s> Alexis: I don't know why I am still talking to you. You keep insulting and accusing me. </s><s> Blake: I'm just trying to stop you from destroying our son's life. </s><s> Alexis: I am his mother, I know what's good for him. </s><s> Blake: No, you're using him for your stupid games against me. </s><s> Alexis: You're really unbelievably self-centred. </s><s> Blake: Alexis, it's not possible to talk to you any more. You're either aggressive or defensive. There is no discussion. </s><s> Alexis: Try not to attack me first. This is a natural reaction to an attack of every human being, of every living creature actually.  </s><s> Blake: I tried to discuss how we are managing our relations with our son. Was it an attack? </s><s> Alexis: No, you attacked me saying I told something to Steven that you apparently didn't like. But you will nor censor me. This time is over. </s><s> Blake: For God's sake!  </s><s> Alexis: I've had enough. I am coming back to my work now. There is more in this world than your huge ego. Bye!
summary: Blake believes that Alexis is trying to turn their son, Steven, against him and has bad influence on Steven. Alexis believes Blake is self-centered and often attacks her and accuses her of things she didn't do.

text: Elisabeth: This is scary. Bolsonaro won in Brazil! </s><s> Richard: I know, unbelievable.  </s><s> Elisabeth: What is going on with this world? </s><s> Richard: Apparently, we're going mad. Almost everybody, almost everywhere. </s><s> Elisabeth: Just like in the 1930s. </s><s> Richard: I didn't want to say that, but I'm afraid you're right. </s><s> Elisabeth: Trump, Putin, Orban, Kaczynski, Erdogan... Ugly nationalists are in charge again. </s><s> Richard: White, rich men... </s><s> Elisabeth: But who and why votes for them. </s><s> Richard: You're not the only one asking now. </s><s> Elisabeth: Maybe we should do something. Join a party, start a movement? We should not just sit and watch the world collapsing. </s><s> Richard: We shouldn't. But I think we need an international movement. Something that would exist and function transnationally, at least in Europe. </s><s> Elisabeth: That would be beautiful. Something that would not preach nation but humanity and brotherhood. </s><s> Richard: And make all people read "Imagined community" by Anderson. We have to deconstruct the nation and move beyond it. And most of all, invest in education. Otherwise there will be a new war. </s><s> Elisabeth: We're heading there already!  </s><s> Richard: oh yes, inevitably :(
summary: Richard and Elisabeth are worried by the current rise of nationalist movements.They draw a parallel between the current situation and the 1930s. They ponder on the need for an international movement that would unify people of different nationalities. Otherwise - they fear - there will be war.
